document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">cat </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">corner </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">sits </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">martial </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">time </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">forgot </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">rat </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">tradition </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">desireless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">lot, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Another </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">class </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">remind </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">neither </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">please </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">nor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">play, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But'not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">make </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">bit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">noise' </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Adjure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">boy! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A little dog that wags his tail
